Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1969...
Injured on 8/6/1969 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/29/1970 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/26/1971 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/7/1972...
Had first career hit on 10/2/1972, off Dick Joyce (ATL)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Detroit on 1/31/1975 (Going to LA: LF J. Yurak. Going to DET: P J. Richard)...
Injured on 9/25/1975 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Injured on 6/1/1977 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
